content.detailedDescription:
This is much the same as my other descriptions which i have posted here--small pin point tiny flashing lights which move quickly and erratically followed by two points meeting up and a large orange ball of light--flash and a loud sound (kindof like a jet taking off)--we are located in a subdivision near the intersection of hwy 26 and i-65.
i believe my last report was in may--however i believe the one before was around this time of year.
content.summary: Seems to happen this time every year

content.detailedDescription: A starlike object in the same location for approx. four years  visible on a clear(not cloudy) night in the buffalo, ny area sky.  does not move.  is a constant white color. does not dim or brighten. when i stand with my arm straight up facing east, the object  is approximately 20 degrees angle of my arm to the east. appears to be same longitude as my location. does not change location through the night. observed without visual aid. was brought to my attention as ufo by friend.
content.summary: Hovering for approximately four years.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the beach on the south hampton shore.  i was talking to someone and noticed a bright triangle in the sky with a large cloud of smoke behind it.  many of us stopped what we were doing and watched it.  it lasted a little while and then disappeared instantly.

i couldn't identify it...  therefore i called it a ufo.  any idea what it was??
content.summary: Bright triangle in the sky with a large cloud of smoke behind it - the triangle disappeared instantly.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my balcony, when i saw a red flashing light at a distance of about 10 km, moving to the west, not too high above the horizon. suddenly it disappeared. few seconds later it came back, only this time it was moving in an opposite direction (to the east) and a little bit higher. then it disappeared again. and when it showed up it was moving to the west again. it went on for a few kilometres accelerating its speed and disappeared again just to show up moments later moving to the east but this time much slower. it accelerated again decreasing its altitude and i lost it out of sight when it went behind a building.
content.summary: Red flashing light repeatedly changing directions.

content.detailedDescription: Myself,my wife and two friends where sitting at our campfire in dansville.We were talking about seeing the moons around jupiter several nights before through a friends telescope that he brought to camp. it was around 8:45. my wife happened to glance up and said, ok, what the heck is that? we all looked up and, near jupiter saw the light. it was bright white, round, about the size of one quater of a full moon with a triangle shaped white mist below it, slightly larger than the brighter light. it did'nt move in any direction during the maybe two minutes we observed it. then, it just vanished. after, we all talked about what it could have been,but came up with no answers. the fact that it didn't move, grow or change color(meateorite), and just disapeared left us without any answer to what we saw.
content.summary: Four of us saw a bright , round, stationary light about the size of one quarter of a full moon with a triangle shaped mist below it.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch looking straight up at the stars in a dark moonless sky when a grey triangular shaped object with what may have been a tail cruised on a straight path by right overhead. the sighting lasted about 12 seconds, and as the object moved away i lost sight of it's silhouetted form. it appeared rather large, obscuring stars as it past over me. the night was quiet and still. it had no lights and made no sound. the ufo traveled from the northwest to the southeast at what i would call medium constant speed. i truly believe the object was a ufo.
content.summary: Triangular grey object cruises overhead with no lights or sound

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were on dalton ridge, in dalton nh, when we observed what has been reported as a nasa rocket fired from wallops island, va.  what we saw is identical to what is depicted in video footage.  just odd that we could see an event that was happening more than 600 miles away.
content.summary: Probably nasa rocket

content.detailedDescription: Never realized this was in the pic, i had this pic as my desktop when i noticed a spec on the monitor cleaned screen and was still there. then i magnetized the speck. looks like a ufo to me. if you look at the clouds behind the object very distorted like no other clouds in sky. i am using cheep hardwareand took pic with 2.1 meg camera, thought someone could clean it up better than me. just above the fence post
content.summary: Taking pics of my dog jumping in the water while my friend tossed the rock.

content.detailedDescription:
Well... i was on my way home from a birthday party, and i looked up in the sky and i saw a shooting star. i looked at it longer. something was wrong. it wasn't shooting. so i grabed ny camera and took a picture. i still have the picture. it looked like a triangular disc hovering for about 15 minutes in the air. it had three lites on the bottom that were always on. now i know no man made aircraft can hover in one place for at least 15 minutes. if you want the picture, mail me saying you want to have it.
there was also a big boom and then it was gone.
content.summary: It was scary, people were crying. there was a big boom

content.detailedDescription: I was wondering if anyone reported any ufo sightings in the vicinity of greenfield, ma or deerfield, ma last saturday, september 19th.  we were on an entrance ramp to i-91 s in greenfield, ma at about 7:30 p.M. when we saw extremely bright lights shining downward in the sky ahead.  there was a ring of bright lights just above these lights. this object appeared to be within a mile from us. i had never before seen any lights this bright coming from an object in the sky.  it was stationary in sky.  as we went up the ramp onto the highway there was a line of trees that blocked the view for a few seconds.  when we got past the trees and could see that area of the sky again, the object was gone.  all that remained was a cloud of light in the sky where we had seen this object.  it looked like a cloud of gas or particles that was emitting light.  my wife and son and his friend all saw this object very clearly for a few seconds before it disappeared.
content.summary: Bright lights shining down from object in sky that suddenly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was camping out on my property that sits along the allegheny river in n.W. pennsylvania. around dusk, approx. 7 pm, i noticed the 1st star in the east, southeast sky. it was just coming over the mountain top across the river. that mountain's elevation is approx. 1400 ft. it was very bright. i've seen this star many times before, but for some reason as it was only dusk, this star was bright white. i then thought of the wise men and the star that led them to christ, then wondered if that star had meaning for me. i was cooking at the time and kept going to my fire and the picnic table and always checking the star. then one trip i looked up and did a double take. i saw another 'star' next to the bright star, only this 'star' had a triangular beam coming down from it. i will refer to the 'star' as the object from here out. the object was 'headlight yellow' as compared to the white star. the triangular beam appeared to be made up of many rays. i thought possibly the atmosphere may have caused these to appear as rays.
the height of both star and object was about 15-20 min. above the mountain top from when the star rose. the object and the star were closer to each other then they were to the mountain top. i could see both easily without moving my head to compare the two...Just slight eyeball shifts.  it was an awesome sight. i then thought to myself i have to go grab my camera and get a picture of this, turned but made a decision not to as i was afraid the object would disappear and i'd miss looking at it,so i turned back to watch the object. just as i refocused on the object, it then disappeared, but the triangular light was still there and it then too disappeared in sections from top to bottom. all disappeared quickly, but it was noticable there was lapse of time from disappearence of object to the bottom beam of light. i wondered if light travel had anything to do with how far the object was from the bottom beam of light!? i thought of an airplane or helicopter casting light, but when the objects light went out, there was not plane or helicopter in sight. it was a beautiful sight. i felt priviledge to have witnessed it. i was never afraid or scared. probably the distance away had much to do with not being afraid.
thanks for providing this outlet so i may share my experience.
content.summary: Object appeared as a star but cast a triangular beam to the ground.

content.detailedDescription: Saturday, september 19th, 2009, i was taking my daily walk around the neighborhood.  it was about 6:00 p.M. and the sun was almost setting. i often look up into the sky when i walk, and as i turned a corner and faced in a northeast direction, i saw a bright white, highly reflective teardrop shaped object stationary in the sky about 40-45 degrees above the horizon.  i couldn't say how high it was, but a plane coming in for a landing at the abq sunport was lower than the object.  i was already returning home, and did not have a camera with me, so i hurried, thinking i could get home and with my camera, zoom in closer and get a better look at what it was.  it never bobbled, but remained perfectly in place the whole time i observed it.  i got home and told my husband to take a look. he got the binoculars out and i got my camera and we went out in the backyard.  he said it was teardrop shaped, and could possibly be a weather balloon, but neither of us saw any tethers, ropes,or payload boxes underneath such as weather balloons usually carry.  it did not drift with the wind, or bobble, or otherwise move at any time during the approximately hour and a half of observing it.  i did take some pictures with my camera, but strangely enough, could not make the camera focus on it.  it hardly even showed up at all with a regular daylight setting on the camera.  however, with a night time setting on the camera i managed to get some pictures, even though they don't do justice to what i could see with the naked eye. my husband and i have seen weather balloons before, since they are seen in this area sometimes, and this was significantly different because of its brightness or high reflectiveness, as well as because it did not move at all for the hour and a half or so that we observed it.  there were some clouds that drifted by, obviously moved by some wind, but the object did not drift or move in any way. after i attempted the pictures of it, we went in the house.  we looked again about a half hour later (around 7:30 p.M. by then) and it was gone.
content.summary: Bright white, highly relfective teardrop shaped

content.detailedDescription:
On monday, september 21, 2009, at approximately 9:00 pm, i witnessed an unexplainable event in kingwood, tx.

i was driving south on loop 494 between royal crossing drive and kingwood drive, near the entrance to the homewood suites hotel. the entire sky suddenly became brightly lit in a bluish color. this lasted approximately 1 second. another second passed and then the entire sky was lit again but in the pattern of 2-3 large beams as if the light were coming from the horizon line. this was too large and too bright to have been any type of spotlight. 

approximately 5 minutes later i was driving north on forest cove drive and a bright blue object (the same shade the lit sky was) flew through the sky in a large arch. the light was traveling very fast. the light seems to blink and then disappeared.

i had a passenger in the front seat who also saw both events.
content.summary: Kingwood, tx (houston, tx)- bright blue beam lights up sky then a blue object arcs through sky and disappearskingwood, tx (houston, tx)- bright blue beam lights up sky then a blue object arcs through sky and disappears.

content.detailedDescription:
A group of four friends, we were walking home slowly through the hyde park area of  north boise.  none of us had been drinking.  a street fair was going on along with a bsu football game, we passed an open-air sports bar and as the others were trying to determine the score i was looking up and saw the red light.  i pointed it out to others on the sidewalk...Met with drunk indifference.  when i could point it out to all of our group, we stood and watched.  a bright red light, much larger than stars/planets, was hovering over us.  it would pulse light slowly, then no pulse, then pulse again at a different rhythm.  when it pulsed the sky looked hazy around it...Or sort of mottled.  the rest of the sky was perfectly clear.  it made no sound.  it seemed to move north very, very slowly, so we crossed the street, and then it, well, it sort of jumped forward, and the pulsing began again.  my husband and one of the others in our group felt very uncomfortable with whatever it was, so we cut off of the main street to take a route of side streets to walk back to our friend's home.  we stopped, and the red light seemed to be receding, but not really moving?  i took a picture with my cell phone (9:20) which i can send if you want but it mostly looks like a red blob in a black field...Though none of the other stars/planets in the sky showed up in the cheesy cell phone picture, so that's how bright the red circle/ball of light was.
we came across three other people watching the same red light, they'd been watching it longer than we had, and had binoculars.  i looked through it, and the red circle of light was made up of lots of individual circles/balls of red lights.  it still was doing the irregular pulsing...Slow rhythm, no pulsing, faster rhythm, etc.  the other three people said earlier it seemed closer, and they could see things 'falling off' the big circle...Like red streamers of light that didn't reach the ground.  while we were watching with these people, one called friends and had them go out and look from their places of residence, and they too could see the red circle.  this was brighter than any light i've ever seen in the sky, including laser lights.  we continued to walk to our friends, and all totaled, had the red pulsing light in sight for about 30 minutes.  
my husband and i drove home to east boise, and could not see the light from our home (we live at the bottom of a mesa...Lots is blocked out looking north).
from the beginning none of us could identify the light...It was not the size or light intensity of anything i've seen (and i am 55).  we all felt uneasy with what we saw...Including the three people we came across watching.  we joked that it was a search for intelligent life, but none could be found since everyone at the hyde park fair and in the bars watching the football game were too tweeked to respond.
i just want to know if others saw this...It was really unusual.  nothing showed up in the papers (which is not unusual, as the paper is barely afloat and prints drivel at best).  the photo is attached below.
content.summary: An intense, large, slow moving/hovering red light tracking north over boise city, pulsed irregularly

content.detailedDescription: My cat woke me up about 5am this morning and as i looked down to see my cat, i glanced out the window and saw a far-off multicolored star-like object darting around in the sky.   i woke my wife up from a sound sleep, told her i think i see a ufo and she witnessed it too.   this object was darting around at incredible speeds and making complete start and stops instantly.  also, it was pulsating in a beautiful multi-colored fashion.  i was pretty blown away by the object since i've never seen anything move like it did.  it was by far the most beautiful and mysterious event i've ever seen in the sky.  after about 6-8 minutes the object faded from sight by either moving too far away or simply faded out.  as far as i can tell it was 40 miles or so away to the northeast somewhere above eastern santa rosa, ca or northern sonoma area.
content.summary: Multicolored star-like ufo darting about

content.detailedDescription:
I was at my community garden, with a fellow gardener we were at benjamin rush state park , philadelphia,pa. it was about 8:30 pm. it was dark , and a very, clear stary night.Above what is a field for flying remote contol airplanes, in the sky about 300 yrds above our heads, was a cone shaped, bright light comming from the sky towards the earth. it was a white lite not intensely, bright, but very bright. i didnt have to squint , or it didnt blind me. the "cone top" was pointing towars the sky and the light got bigger and brighter as it came towards the earth. i did not see a ship of any kind. 
  although, we both saw a cloudish substance that the light was shining through. there were no clouds in the sky that night. the light came from the clouds or a fog as it looked like to us. i have a gut feeling that it was a cloaking or invisability type of camo that made us think we are seeing nothing or a cloud
 there was no noise associated with what we saw that night. i would like to know if phila north east airport, wich is 5 min from this place noticed anything on radar at around 8:30  that night .
  it was not a plane, a helicopter, or lightning , or a meteor falling. it was a bright cone shaped light that came from the black sky towards the earth, did not quite reach the earth then faded away invisibly into the nighht.
  when i first saw it i said what the f is that, i wasnt scared as i was wondering to myself, what is that light? as it grew larger and brighter i thought , oh my god, here we go im going to see something crazy. then it sarted to fade away , and i was freeking out , telling the guy i was with that was crazy.. i asked him what he saw and he told me exactlly what i saw, i wasnt crazy..

im not sure if what i saw was a natural phenominom, or a ufo light comming down. but we did see it, and it was not a usual thing it was totally out of everyday life and the ordinary. 

i have seen hundreds of planes, satellites,heat lightning, shooting stars, etc, and this was none of them. 

this is what the both of us saw on sat night sept 19 2009 in ben rush state park in philadelphia pa ..
content.summary: Bright cone shaped light appeared from the sky then dissapeared .

content.detailedDescription: I was in my bedroom an my mother called me from outside on the balcony and when i got there she pointed out to sea and there was a red glowing orbe she said she was watching it for 5 minutes then as we were standing there watching it another one blincked in to the right of it i couldent beleave what i had just seen it just apaired i ran and got my banoqolars  and looked atthem to see if i could see any blincking lights of any kind but they were solled red orbes then the one to the left  blincked out  an dthen a few minutes laiter the other one did the same. iwas a trained observer in the us marine corps a scout sniper for six years and i know they werent any kind of plane one second they were there and another second they were gone. my mother saw the same thing.
content.summary: 2 red orbs off coast over the ocean

content.detailedDescription:
When i was at my great uncle's lake house on hillside lake in hopewell junction, ny my great uncle louie, great uncle ed, and myself were sitting by the water. i was throwing rocks into the water nd noticed an intense bright light reflected from the surface. i thought it was the sun, but noticed the sun being reflected in another part of the lake.  my uncle louie said, "what is that bright light?" i responded that i did not know. we turned and looked into the sky to find the object being reflected from the water's surface and saw the bright light had become a black sphere. we called my uncle ed over to see the object. 
we witnessed the sphere moving slowly and silently from behind us (west) pass overhead, and continue east over the lake. my uncles told me to run up to the house for the binoculars they keeps by the door for bird watching. still without sound the sphere continued flying. we all saw the object closely and clearly through the binoculars. a sphere with 3 lights flashing on the back end, no wings, no engine noise, no jets, no props.  from the west 3-5 (my memory on the exact number is cloudy at this point) prop planes flew over our heads possibly from dutchess county airport and approached the object. the object was at least a mile away at this point. all of the airplanes flew out toward the object and turned back toward the airport in one pass each. the sphere and planes were at the same altitude, or so it appeared. from this inference i would assume the object was approximately the size of a single engine private prop plane and only a few hundred feet in the air. the object disappeared from view as it went over the trees and horizon. uncle louie and i thought that was had seen a strange flying object that appeared to have no means of staying aloft. uncle ed seemed shaken and did not want to discuss the object. i'm certain it was in late july or mid august of 1987. there were no news accounts that i have been able to find.
content.summary: Sphere with 3 lights, 3 ground witnesses, 3-5 airplane witnesses.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my backyard setting up my telescope getting ready to view mars as it rose over the roof of my house. i noticed a flash and just wrote it off i thought it was just a meteorite or trick of my eyes as i hadn't been outside very long at that point. then i noticed a flash in the same place, i stood very still watching the same region i thought i saw it and then i saw a flash of light, just a bright blink a lot like a plane strobe.
 i continued watching that region for another 5-10 minutes, it was blinking sometimes every 4 seconds or so, sometimes over 10 seconds between blinks. i know the difference between planes and satellites in the sky at night, i've been an amateur astronomer for nearly 20 years. this was neither of those.
 it was in the sky for at least 20 maybe 30 minutes, it appeared to be moving east into orion constellation. 
 the light was white colored, i was unable to view it directly through the telescope, but i could see it in my view finder. 
i could see no body that would have been emitting the light, no actual source, only the light itself, and it was very slow moving in an eastern direction.
 i had gotten my girlfriend outside to witness it with me. before i she was outside with me i had seen what appeared to be a satellite, red colored and moved straight through the sky, it was also headed east. upon looking up satellites for these times im unable to find any that were moving through the sky in that direction at all that time.
 as my girlfriend was viewing this light through my telescopes view finder, she was startled by what she said was another light that had crossed through the view scope very close to the blinking light.
i included a graphic using starry night program for visual aid.
content.summary: Blinking light in orion constellation

content.detailedDescription:
While looking at the stars from my back patio last night, 9/20/09, at approximately 23:30 hours, i saw what appeared at first to be a star in the north east sky.  what struck me as odd was it was flashing more quickly and more strongly than a typical star and that the flashing was in different colors.  i was able to discern white, red and blue flashing with my naked eye.  

i called my wife to come see this object so that i could get a second opinion.  she too agreed it didn't appear to be a typical star nor a plane or helicopter as it didn't move at all over several minutes.  the object was stationary so i had her continue to watch it while i went to get our digital camera.  i was able to take some pictures and some video of the object.  i went out again a couple of times later, and the object was still there.  the last time i checked was around 00:30 on 9/21/09 and the object was still there, maybe a little dimmer but still there.

upon reviewing the video in slow motion the next day, my son showed to me that it was actually changing into more than three colors.  since it was stationary for at least an hour and changed colors unlike a star, plane or helicopter, we feel it is most likely a ufo because it defied us being able to determine what it was. 

note: the object seemed to be completely stationary the whole time we observed it.  in the video i am posting, the movement was all me as i didn't have the camera on a tripod.
content.summary: Looked like star but flashed more quickly and with different colors: red, blue, white, green, yellow and purple

content.detailedDescription:
In a hot summer night went for a remote area 5 km north of odeleite - algarve with my ex-girl and we parked the vehicle in a desert zone ( we get off road with the vehicle to the right corner of the mainroad and went 300 meters inside the trees 
after staying there chating for swhile and listen to some music we start feeling static in the radio but the zone is near spain and often occures interferences in frequency signals. we put on a tape and then we passed to the back seats. when we both were, you imagine..., naked and were starting we were surprised by a bright light that first was too intense (until eyes kepting use to ). we both jumped to the front seats thinking of someone that catch us or other car then immediatly we saw something ! the light couldn't be a car or something known - we were seeing a revolving (moving on is axle ) pink great orb light ( not a ufo altghought i may admit that a triangular red/pink one rotating fast could do something like that ). the orb was behind and occuping 4 trees large and half middle high and seemed far from the ground. we could see ray's getting out of middle in the rotation. the estimated diameter could be far from 10 meters diameter, also the proximity to the vehicle.
we didn't seen much more....We start the car immediatly and do a inversion and get out fast off there. i then returned thru the mainroad to odeleite and stopped the car about 1 km down in it. get off and tried to calm down ( also dress up ), taked out a cigar and tried to see at distance some kind of light, but nothing more have been seen. i think i really seen somekind of orb anomality, i probably believe of somesort of timelapse, because it seemed to us that ( without no more stops ) we taked to long to arriving to the next city...
content.summary: 10 meters diameter  pink bright revolving orb at ground level  2 witness

content.detailedDescription:
The first person to notice the object was my uncle as he was leaving my aunts house, which is located on the south shore of long island. the back yard faces west, the object was observed by myself and 7 other people moving slowly from west to west by northwest. on occasion the object moved towards the east. the object was in the sky for more than two hours. unfortunately no visible evidence was captured due to the fact the object was more than 10 miles away, at first it seemed to be parachute or a plastic bag, but once we found a pair of binoculars i and others saw that it was a flying object, hovering in place and moving on its own will. also noted was the fact that the object did not follow any type of pattern or destination. once seen through the lenses, i saw that the object was somewhat triangular in frame but with very soft edges giving it a round structure, the center of the object was open, with the exception of three columns going through it. on occasion i saw that the object "wiggled", the feelings at first were of course of skepticism and curiosity. admittedly i was annoyed that the only camera available didnt have enough zoom to capture the object, but once we found the binoculars the first reaction came from my aunt who shouted out "es  una nave" meaning its a craft!, once i saw through the lenses i was immediately shocked at what i was looking because i couldnt explain it. there is no known device that ive read, seen, or heard about that closely resembles the structure of the fact that there was no evidence of propulsion even through it flew and hovered with ease.
i tried to stay watch over the craft but unfortunately night fell and the object being dark in color faded into the back drop and although it did show a beacon of light twice from what i would assume to be the nose of the object  it didnt shine again after that. this was an exciting and scary event, exciting because it is something i cant answer, and scary because its something i cant answer.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dark object  round in shape, no lights, or propulsion visible.

content.detailedDescription: There were about 10 people sitting around a campfire. someone pointed up at the sky. we all saw a light coming down from the sky like an upside down triangle. the light only lasted about 15-20 seconds then slowly faded away.
content.summary: An upside down cone of light. not touching ground

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting in my garden talking to my wife i saw fast moving object moving in a straight line across the sky. it caught my attention due to its speed of flight. it was too small for a plane and too fast for a  bird. as i looked i could make out no discernible protuberances such as wings or fins - it was simply a small silver ball moving in a very straight line. it eventually disappeared from my line of sight as it flew over neighbouring houses moving roughly south. 

we have planes flying over head fairly regularly and in the next half an hour i observed two. the first a high flying jet which moved across the sky extremely slowly compared to the object i had seen. the second was a single engine propellor plane which appeared to be flying at a similar height but was noticeably bigger and quite clearly an aircraft.
content.summary: Shiny, silver round object flew past

content.detailedDescription: This event happened on july 11th 2009. i was at my friends house at a party. this was located in saltsburg, on a hill basically all alone. i was in the house at the time, and my friend called me outside because they said they thought they saw a ufo. my friend is not a believer in ufo's at all, so i ran outside. as i looked up, i saw a triangular shaped craft flying slower than a plane above us. as i watched it, the triangle of lights rotated counter clockwise once. it was making no noise at all. this craft did this rotating motion randomly. it rotated about every ten seconds while flying directly above us, but as it started to get farther and farther away, it rotated less and less. almost as if showing off for us? i'm not quite sure. i was very much excited, yet scared when i saw this strange craft go by. i knew it wasn't a plane though for sure.
content.summary: Rotating triangle of lights

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling north on route 87, a noticed five "stars" that were slightly larger in appearance and dimmer than surrounding stars. their positionm relative to each other seemed odd, ansd since i have a very high suspicion level, i kept looking at them as my wife was driving.

their positing in the sky relative to each other was as follows.


                     0             0



               0            0             0                

the structure, or pattern, that was formed appeared to me as too perfect. 

after about an hour of observing them, suddenly the upper two and the last one on the lower right began to move. 

i have seen so many of these and other unusial phenomena in the adirondacks, that it is becoming old hat to me. most of my sitings were in the vicinity  of sherman lake.
content.summary: Saw 5 lights in sky while traveling north   route 87. appeared to be slightly large, dim stars. after observingf them for about an hour, 3 of them began to move around.

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling north on route 87, a noticed five "stars" that were slightly larger in appearance and dimmer than surrounding stars. their positionm relative to each other seemed odd, ansd since i have a very high suspicion level, i kept looking at them as my wife was driving.

their positing in the sky relative to each other was as follows.


                     0             0



               0            0             0                

the structure, or pattern, that was formed appeared to me as too perfect. 

after about an hour of observing them, suddenly the upper two and the last one on the lower right began to move. 

i have seen so many of these and other unusial phenomena in the adirondacks, that it is becoming old hat to me. most of my sitings were in the vicinity  of sherman lake.
content.summary: Saw 4 lights in sky while traveling north   route 87. appeared to be slightly large, dim stars. after observingf them for about an hour, 3 of them began to move around.

content.detailedDescription:
Me and my friend wher outside the porch of house drinking coffee when out of nowhere a triangular shape object was hovering over us at about 35- 50' in the sky, it was avery clear sky and full moon so i got to see the deatails of the object. it was traveling at about 20-to 35 mph. the three lights wher very dim but i got to see more details on the object. it was not scary at all i was just in a big wow . i ask my friend george (did you see that ?) he answerd ,( i told you they wher real.)the encounter it lasted about 15 seaconds and thats when it past the top of the house.
after that incident i have had the chance to see another object cilyder typ in the month of june 2009, traveling at super speed .Now that was a little scary. 
fitchburg mass. is avery hot spot for these objects all you have to do is look up on a clear night and you will have a big chance to see one some day.
good hunting!
content.summary: Triangle shape 3 lights 45' in diameter.

content.detailedDescription:
Went to new mexico thu-sun and got pics from outside of our hotel on saturday. they all show the same object.  this object was stationary in the sky from about 5:15-7:30.  at first, we thought it may be a balloon since it is nm.  

we were walking into our hotel and saw this and decided to go back to the car and grab the binoculars.  using them, we could see that it wasn't a hot air balloon.  it was silvery/pearly white, teardrop shape, but no basket on the bottom.  the inside was dark grey-black, like a small circle in the middle.  it wasn't moving.  there also wasn't a string or thing on the bottom showing that it was a weather balloon, either.  i took a few pictures from outside the hotel (you can see the billboard in the pics).  we went up to our room and sat in the window seat to get a better look.  it still hadn't moved, but clouds started coming across it.  then clouds settled in, so we stopped looking and ate dinner.  

we decided to go for a sunset drive by our hotel and into the foothills.  sure enough, when the clouds parted, it was still there.  at this time, the black area inside of it started to turn orange/red.  by the time dusk turned to night, it started to fade and was gone completely.  all in all, for 2 hours, it didn't move left or right, up or down.  considering this, its design, and strange behavior, we decided that it couldn't be a weather balloon.  if you zoom into the pics, you can get a better view.
content.summary: Teardrop-shaped object stationary in sky for 2 hours, until dusk.

content.detailedDescription:
Trianglular ship lit up over sandy hook, nj.   the light that it emitted was so bright that it lit up the sea like daytime.The entire craft was lit in a triangular shape, emitted a cloud of smoke after it lit the ocean then disappeared. gone!  this was 11:30pm saturday night.    
 
this is the 2nd siting in the same area within the past month.  the first one that i saw was during the daytime and i sent in a photo of this to you in a prior report. (i have heard nothing back from this prior report). 

this triangular ship was seen by my neighbor that doesnt/didnt believe in ufo's.  he said the ship sent out a light that was so bright that it lit up the entire ocean. the craft emitted a cloud of smoke from underneith then disappered. i just spoke to a highlands police officer who called into headquarters to ask if there were any other reports.  there were two other sitings of this craft reported.  

we live on the new jersey shore overlooking the water.   earle ammunition base is not far from us withing a 5 mile radius.  i know they have nuclear subs that pass under the bridge.  

two sitings of different shape crafts is unusual withing a months time.  these were just the ones that we happened to notice.  

please contact me at your convenience.  i would like to help research if you need my help.   i sit at the beach at night on clear nights but have only seen satallites (stars moving very slowly across the night sky but in different directions).

i can be reached at the 908 cell number.   frank can be reached at the above 732 cell number.

fondly,
helaine camacho

ps- i would be happy to resend the photos that i have of my daytime ufo siting. maybe you have the ability to zoom in better. i took the photo of the boat party on an island not noticing anything in the sky. when i cropped away the extra sea and sky the object appeared clear as day.  this occured on aug 18th 2009.
content.summary: 3 sitings of triangle ufo, lit up entire night sky then vanished
